channel.title: Contact Us on Wilson Manufacturing
channel.description: Recent content in Contact Us on Wilson Manufacturing

item.title: Keith Chrisco
item.description: About Me Keith works hard to make die purchasing much easier for his customers. Twenty years of experience at Wilson help Keith to offer extensive technical knowledge of the converting process. A proven expertise in problem-solvingâ€”particularly for automotive, gasket and specialty die-cutting applications, helps him manage little details most competitors miss. Away from work, Keith devotes his free time to hunting, fishing and working his farm in northern Missouri.

item.title: Tonia Boswell
item.description: About Me For Tonia, customer satisfaction and service is always the number one priority. Tonia first joined Wilson in 2004, and is dedicated to customer support for the territory covered by sales representative Mari Werner. During her free time, Tonia stays busy raising her two young children, and enjoys reading, boating and water sports.
